address: Xã Tân Bình, Huyện Đăk Đoa, Tỉnh Gia Lai
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change**

Okay, so I'm presented with an old address: "Xã Tân Bình, Huyện Đăk Đoa, Tỉnh Gia Lai," and need to find its new administrative unit (ward).  My initial approach is straightforward: I need to work through the location details.

First, I quickly identify the province as "Tỉnh Gia Lai."  Then, I need to check for any province mergers or reorganizations, so I consult those relevant resolutions. Thankfully, Gia Lai didn't change names, although it did absorb Bình Định, meaning the province name remains "Tỉnh Gia Lai."

Now, the real work begins. I dive into the resolutions, focusing on changes within Gia Lai, especially within Đăk Đoa district. I'm looking for "Tân Bình."  My search leads me to the "Other resolutions" and specifically to "1664/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Gia Lai."  This looks promising.

I scan line by line and find line 86. Bingo! It explicitly mentions "xã Tân Bình," along with "thị trấn Đak Đoa."  This is great context, telling me this line is pertinent. It states that "xã Tân Bình" and "thị trấn Đak Đoa" were merged to become "xã Đak Đoa".

To be absolutely sure and find the precise, authoritative, current identifier, I cross-reference this information. I search the "New wards" list for this: `{"ward_name":"Xã Đak Đoa","province_name":"Tỉnh Gia Lai"}` and confirm that the ward code is "23677."

My confidence is very high here because the resolution directly addresses the specific ward "Tân Bình" within the district of interest.  So, based on this analysis, I will confidently construct the JSON output, including the relevant citation and all key details:  province name "Tỉnh Gia Lai," ward code "23677," and new ward name "Xã Đak Đoa."

citation.header: 1664/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Gia Lai
citation.line: 86. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của thị trấn Đak Đoa, xã Tân Bình và xã Glar thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Đak Đoa.
